signature: protected static int[] matches(final CharSequence first, final CharSequence second)
name: matches
javadoc:
/**
 * Calculates the similarity between two character sequences using the Jaro-Winkler distance metric.
 *
 * @param first  the first character sequence to compare
 * @param second the second character sequence to compare
 * @return an array containing the similarity score and the number of matches
 */

signature: public <E> Double apply(final SimilarityInput<E> left, final SimilarityInput<E> right)
name: apply
javadoc:
/**
 * Calculates a similarity score between two SimilarityInput objects.
 *
 * @param left  The first SimilarityInput object to compare.
 * @param right The second SimilarityInput object to compare.
 * @return A value between 0 and 1 representing the similarity between the two input sequences.
 *         Higher values indicate greater similarity.
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException If either of the input sequences is null.
 */
